inscription:
Signature; Inscriptions; Date; Marks
in pencil, recto, listed from top: [Le Bon ton] [No 2] [1835] [M. Sévilles(?) M. Lemoriar(?)] [Berthe velour noir ___ jaune M ___ Brunet] [Robe de ___ rose garnies passif ___ montants. ___ de rubans de satin rose, rose-blanches. Sui velour epinglé vert ___.] [Robe de ___ ___ Satin (blanc), plume de Paou, fleurs d'or(?), bonnet d'Areytiterne(?)]
medium: Watercolor and graphite and traces of white on off-white wove paper
title: Three Women in an Interior
